title: Georgia Love stuns in snake skin dress as she and Lee Elliot attend Judy premiere in Melbourne
text:
The Bachelorette's Georgia Love got engaged to her boyfriend-of-three-years Lee Elliott in August.

And on Tuesday, the 31-year-old was spotted enjoying a date night with her hunky fiancé at the film premiere for Judy in Melbourne.

Georgia looked smitten with her beau as she cosied up to him for photos on the red carpet outside the historic Capitol Theatre on Swanston Street.

Date night! Georgia Love (right) was spotted enjoying a date night with her hunky fiancé Lee Elliot (left) at the Judy Premiere in Melbourne

At one point, Lee affectionately put his arm around Georgia as they posed in front of a glittery sign to promote the film about legendary screen actress Judy Garland.

Georgia stunned wearing a flowing snake-print frock, which featured puffy sleeves and a thigh-high split.

The newsreader's flawless visage was highlighted by a fresh-faced makeup look, consisting of copper-toned eye shadow, plenty of mascara and a pastel pink lip.

Red carpet ready! Georgia (pictured) stunned on the red carpet wearing a snakeskin frock which featured puffy sleeves and a thigh-high split

Pulling out all the stops! Georgia (pictured) elevated her red carpet look with a taupe handbag and a pair of black strappy heels

She wore her brunette tresses in loose flowing waves, with a side part, which revealed her dangling gold and black statement earrings.

Georgia elevated her red carpet look with a taupe handbag and a pair of black strappy heels.

Lee looked every inch the distinguished gentleman in a classic black suit, teamed with a crisp white shirt and a black-and-white spotted pocket square.

The couple announced their happy news in late August, with Georgia sharing a snap of herself flashing her ring while cuddling up to Lee at the Hawkesbury River in NSW.

'If you're not busy for the next 50 or 60 years....', Georgia captioned a photo of herself and Lee after they got engaged, adding, '#YES!!'

Lee shared a similar snap to his Instagram, with the caption: 'I liked it so I put a ring on it. #feyonce'

'If you're not busy for the next 50 or 60 years....', the newsreader captioned the snap, adding, '#YES!!'

The engagement came the same week Lee celebrated their third anniversary by sharing a photo of the pair together to Instagram.

'Loved you then, love you still. Always have, always will. Happy 3rd anniversary gorgeous @georgiealove,' Lee wrote.

Georgia's romance with Lee has defied critics, with the pair's relationship still going strong three years on from them finding love on The Bachelorette back in 2016.
description: Georgia Love was spotted enjoying a date night with her hunky fiancé at the Judy Premiere in Melbourne.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
